Review.Titre: My cell phone was recharged much less that what I already paid.
Review.Contenu: I paid US$ 8.50 (+ processing fees) to recharge my cell phone in Egypt. This is equal to EGP 263.00 (official Central Bank Exchange Rate in Egypt). It's even much higher than that outside the bank system.For my surprise, the only amount received by Vodafone (my cell company in Egypt) was ONLY EGP 140.00!! ... What is that?!! I'm sure the huge difference was NOT the processing fee, because I paid the processing fee in addition to the US$ 8.50. So, where is the rest of the money?!!.

Used this company since 2016 with no issues, and in the past few months they have gone downhill to the point I had to cancel the plan. Customer service is useless, cant make international calls and they have not been very helpful. Its now more trouble than its worth and cant count on if the calls will even work?

My account was set up to auto renew but when last used it cut us off for lack of funds after around 15 minutes.   It took 20 minutes to make contact with an aunt in Moscow and we are not happy to be cut off for lack of funds.
Breaking connection sometimes every few minutes

Review.Titre: We love CallingCards as it connects us…
Review.Contenu: We love CallingCards as it connects us well with our office in China.  However, we seem to repeatedly be told that we are "out of minutes" even though we switched to the "World Unlimited" plan which auto-renews $10 at a time.

Review.Titre: I would like to be able to speak to a…
Review.Contenu: I would like to be able to speak to a representative need to have a customer service number with a live person who speaks English as a first language
Sometimes the calls are clear and sometimes not. Topping up mobile is easy but CallingCards foreign exchange rate is well below the current rates and they still charge a transaction fee.

Review.Titre: Prefer to have the billing on a set day
Review.Contenu: I'd prefer to have the billing on set days of the month, like the 5th, 10th, 20th, etc so I can set up automatic payments or at least be able to remember when a payment is due. Every 30 days just doesn't work for me. After a few months it's a completely different date!

One of my credit cards was cancelled by VISA so I tried updating my account with the replacement card.  I was able to add the new card but I couldn't replace or delete the old card.  The old card is still the card being used by CallingCard and somehow VISA is still letting it go through.

Review.Titre: I give 3 stars because it is very…
Review.Contenu: I give 3 stars because it is very annoying that there is no 1 minute warning so that I could say bye to the person that I was talking to unliked before..  For  me, that is very unprofessional, very rude!

Review.Titre: I like the email invoice that you…
Review.Contenu: I like the email invoice that you recieve every time you recharge.Sometimes overseas calls are not In tip top quality . Overall I am satisfied.

Review.Titre: The company has good customer service
Review.Contenu: The company has good customer service. Calls are clear and uninterupted. Price rates are reasonable. I will recommend to friends.
Service has been very dependable for many years and at a bargain price. However, one small gripe. Phone call is terminated without warning after 2 hours.

Review.Titre: It's hard to keep my auto refill to…
Review.Contenu: It's hard to keep my auto refill to work.   But I do have great quality calls and service is very good.   I recommend to all my friends.

Review.Titre: your company has improved greatly since…
Review.Contenu: your company has improved greatly since I joined years ago.  And your prices have stayed pretty much the same!  The site is easier to use now, and I haven't had problems with ordering as much as years ago.Best to all there for the Holidays and New Year!
I had to re-enter data several times; didn't see that the coupon data was blanked, hence lost the discount.
Great value, website is a bit tricky to navigate, especially the billing functions
Easy to purchase. Recomeded.
I've been purchasing calling cards from this company almost 15 yrs they have the best price service is amazing
I have used Callingcards.com for over 5 years.  Great company that you can trust.
CallingCards is easy to use and provides reliable service.

Review.Titre: They do what they say and they make the…
Review.Contenu: They do what they say and they make the process simple.

Review.Titre: I can always connect with my family in…
Review.Contenu: I can always connect with my family in Southamerica. It is easy to dial the number having the card number and codes setted on your phone.Puedo conectarme con mi familia siempre. Es muy fácil marcar solo el número al que llamas cuando ya tienes la tarjeta y códigos pre-registrados en tu telefono.

Review.Titre: Transparency in Delivery of Service is Important.
Review.Contenu: What I really appreciate about services and sites like this is that the transactions are entirely transparent.  Normally, when I find out there are sneaky fees or gotcha expirations, I cancel the contract or subscription and find someone who doesn't.  MobileCaller/CallingCards.com hasn't done anything like that yet and I doubt it ever will.  Also, the quality of the product is really good.  I have never had any problems with call fidelity.  It can be a little tricky getting the PIN number in fast enough on a smartphone; sometimes the dial-to number takes too long to enter as well.
I emailed customer service and got a reply back very promptly and my issue was solved straight awY.

I have been using this service for a long time to call daily my mother in Italy. The connection is very reliable, and the signal is excellent. This has allowed us feel less distant. Prior to callingcards.com, I have been using other providers and the service was not comparable. Price is also excellent.
Easy to use, easy to plug the numbers into my phone and take advantage of pinless & speed dialing. Easy to recharge. Awesome!

The pricing is very competitive. Their website is very easy to navigate for payments, selecting plans, refill, saving phone numbers, etc. Features like in-less dialing, access numbers in many countries, and speed dialing are very helpful. Local and international call quality is excellent.

I lost my credit card. Besides getting another card, I had to contact every business that had automatic payments on the card. I forgot about calling cards com.They contacted me and within 24 hours my account was reinstated on my new credit card.And the cost of calls out of the country is amazing. I have been using the service for years with never a problem.

Review.Titre: I can't believe that everyone who calls…
Review.Contenu: I can't believe that everyone who calls outside the US doesn't use CallingCards.  For only ten bucks I can talk to my friends in England any time I want to call them. Being able to stay in touch with them by just picking up the phone is worth way more than $10 to me.

Review.Titre: I've used Calling Cards for quite a few…
Review.Contenu: I've used Calling Cards for quite a few years with absolutely no problems calling friends and family in different parts of the world. Of course, if the recipient could recognize my phone number it would be a huge bonus but the cost of the monthly unlimited plan is so good I wouldn't change a thing.

Review.Titre: Easy to Maintain Contact         I have been using Calling 9Cards for…
Review.Contenu: I have been using Calling Cards for 3 years to keep in touch with my nephew in China. The local access number is convenient and connections in China are crisp with no time delay. I am pleased with the cost and efficiency of the service and have recommended it to others.  WPA

Review.Titre: I thank your company for making it easy…
Review.Contenu: I thank your company for making it easy for us to stay communicated to our family in other country at a very very affordable rate. my thanks to your company and that you continue to have a prosperous business.God Bless you all.....Mrs Ruiz
So convenient, easy to purchase and use.
